name: Living Room
description:
GAME

Living Room is a relaxing game in which you move in with your girlfriend. Unfortunately, there's not enough space on the living room bookshelf, so you'll have to choose what you want to display: your stuff or hers.

This game is inspired by "Unpacking" by Witch Beam. Thank you for making an awesome game!

CREDITS

MXiaa : Game & Narrative Design, 2D Art.

Wiljunow : Game & Narrative Design, Development, Sound Design.

MUSIC

Us, Coffee, And Friends by Skye Jordan (c) copyright 2021 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license.

http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/SkyeJordan/64168

SOUNDS

18. putting down a cardboard coffee cup.wav - dsmolenaers

Pop 7 - greenvwbeetle

Getting out of a ball pit - pfranzen

slide.wav - j1987

GAME JAM

This game was made for our first Trijam, the #181: Storage Management, in 15 hours (whoops...).
